00006 #include <iostream>

00008 using namespace std;
00009 using namespace stor;

00011 DrainingQueues::DrainingQueues( my_context c ): my_base(c)
00012 {
00013   cout << "Entering " << stateName() << " state" << endl;
00014 
00015   // Get the work loop
00016   // This workloop may or may not exists from a previous invocation of
00017   // DrainingQueues, but should have no actions attached to it.
00018   // Note that the workloop is ownded by the factory.
00019   _workloop =
00020     toolbox::task::getWorkLoopFactory()->getWorkLoop("DrainingQueuesWorkloop", "waiting");
00021 
00022   if ( ! _workloop->isActive() )
00023   {
00024     // only do it if the we are not already working on draining the queues
00025     _doDraining = true;
00026 
00027     // Bind the action
00028     toolbox::task::ActionSignature* actionSignature = 
00029       toolbox::task::bind(this, &stor::DrainingQueues::action, "DrainingQueuesAction");
00030 
00031     // Add action to workloop
00032     _workloop->submit(actionSignature);
00033     
00034     // Activate the workloop
00035     _workloop->activate();
00036   } 
00037   else
00038   {
00039     // I guess we need something more drastic here
00040     cout << "Draining queues already in progress" << endl;
00041   }
00042 }
00043 
00044 DrainingQueues::~DrainingQueues()
00045 {
00046   cout << "Exiting " << stateName() << " state" << endl;
00047 
00048   // Stop the draining action
00049   _doDraining = false;
00050 
00051   // Cancel the workloop
00052   // Cancel will wait until the draining action has finished
00053   _workloop->cancel();
00054 }
00055 
00056 string DrainingQueues::do_stateName() const
00057 {
00058   return string( "DrainingQueues" );
00059 }

00066 
00067 void DrainingQueues::emergencyStop(const EmergencyStop &event)
00068 {
00069   _doDraining = false;
00070 }

00072 
00073 bool DrainingQueues::action(toolbox::task::WorkLoop* wl)
00074 {
00075   unsigned int count = 0;
00076 
00077   while ( _doDraining && count < 10 )
00078   {
00079     std::cout << "Draining queues" << std::endl;
00080     ::usleep(100);
00081     ++count;
00082   }
00083 
00084   post_event( StopDone() );
00085 
00086   std::cout << "Draining queues finished" << std::endl;
00087 
00088   return false; // do not reschedule me (removes the action from the wl)
00089 }
